name: @educorvi/rita-smt
description: A module to test satisfiability of Rita rule sets.
author: Julian Pollinger

scripts.build: vite build && BUILD_TARGET=bin vite build && BUILD_TARGET=worker vite build && mv dist/bin.cjs dist/bin.js && mv dist/bin.cjs.map dist/bin.js.map && mv dist/BenchmarkingWorker.cjs dist/BenchmarkingWorker.js && mv dist/BenchmarkingWorker.cjs.map dist/BenchmarkingWorker.js.map && (grep -q '^#!/usr/bin/env node' dist/bin.js || (printf '#!/usr/bin/env node\n' | cat - dist/bin.js > dist/bin.tmp && mv dist/bin.tmp dist/bin.js)) && chmod +x dist/bin.js
scripts.test: >&2 echo "Tests for rita-smt are temporarily disabled. Run them with 'npx jest'"
